description: Enhances support for StationPlaylist apps. In addition, adds global commands for the Studio application from everywhere.
changelog:
* With debug logging enabled, NVDA will no longer record Studio API specific debug messages. A new command-line option (--spl-apidebug) was added to include Studio API debug messages and should be used as directed by add-on developers.
* In Studio, search history in track finder (Control+NVDA+F) is replaced with a search edit field to align with NVDA's own find dialog experience.
* In Studio, when braille timer is enabled, NVDA will only announce remaining track/intro duration if the value displayed falls below end of track/song ramp alarm value instead of displaying track remaining time.

translations.description: Verbessert die Unterstützung für StationPlaylist-Anwendungen. Darüber hinaus werden globale Befehle für die Studio-Anwendung von überall aus hinzugefügt.
translations.changelog:
* With debug logging enabled, NVDA will no longer record Studio API specific debug messages. A new command-line option (--spl-apidebug) was added to include Studio API debug messages and should be used as directed by add-on developers.
* In Studio, search history in track finder (Control+NVDA+F) is replaced with a search edit field to align with NVDA's own find dialog experience.
* In Studio, when braille timer is enabled, NVDA will only announce remaining track/intro duration if the value displayed falls below end of track/song ramp alarm value instead of displaying track remaining time.

translations.description:
Aprimora o suporte aos aplicativos StationPlaylist. Além disso, adiciona comandos globais para o aplicativo Studio de qualquer lugar.Melhora o suporte para aplicativos StationPlaylist.
